name: Eta Theta Tau - iOS
tagline: ios app created for SongFest at Pepperdine University
body:
### Eta Theta Tau
Eta Theta Tau - The official app for HθT, the songfest group at Pepperdine University

The app can be downloaded on the App store [here.](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/eta-theta-tau/id968721594?mt=8)

Songfest is a yearly mini-musical competition held at Pepperdine University. Eta Theta Tau is one of the 7 current performing groups. Check out http://www.pepperdinesongfest.com/ for more info.

### App Features

•	Get info about daily rehearsals
•	Stay connected with HθT Leadership
•	Get notifications with updates about the show 
•	Access lyrics to the song from the show
•	Read the script and practice lines 
•	Check out videos of the choreography
•	See the "Hottie of the Day"

### Authors and Contributors
RJ Aylward (@rjaylwar) is the only current contributor
